movies.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
movies.description: Jake and Neytiri's family grapples with grief, encountering a new, aggressive Na'vi tribe, the Ash People, who are led by the fiery Varang, as the conflict on Pandora escalates and a new moral focus emerges.

movies.title: David
movies.description: From his mother's songs to his clash with Goliath, David's journey from humble shepherd to anointed king tests the limits of faith, courage, and love--culminating in a battle for the soul of a kingdom.
